thread.title: Water supplies handed out to drivers stuck on M20
thread.title_full: Water supplies handed out to drivers stuck on M20 | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Water supplies handed out to drivers stuck on M20
text:
Thousands of water bottles are being handed out to lorry drivers that are stuck on the M20 in the scorching temperatures.
Coastguards are working with police and volunteers to make sure motorists are coping in the heat.
Play video Last updated Wed 1 Jul 2015 Read more 54 updates Port of Dover reopens but Operation Stack remains in place Travel Dover
